attributes.action: Allow fathers the right to see their children after a difficult separation.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.fathers-4-justice.org/about-f4j/our-story/

A really good read, and just a snippet of what so many fathers are going through at the moment. 

Seeing your children is a basic human right, and women have the power to currently play God with their children's lives. 

I believe both parents should have equal access to their children, to allow their child to grow up knowing and loving them. Good fathers should not be penalised for not wanting to be in a relationship with partners anymore.
attributes.background: After a difficult separation, I was refused access to my little boy, despite being a 'brilliant dad'. Despite having parental responsibility, I have had to pay thousands in court and lawyer's fees just to gain the right to see my boy. It is a basic human right taken away by ridiculous family law.
